name: zoo_team
description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.

scripts.start:backend: npm install --prefix backend && npm run dev --prefix backend
scripts.start:frontend: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run dev --prefix frontend
scripts.start: npm i && concurrently -k --success first -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c cyan,magenta "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
